meanings.definition: Having a taste characteristic of sugar or honey
meanings.sent1: The candy was sweeter than the fruit.
meanings.sent2: The cake was much sweeter than the bread.
meanings.sent3: The tea tasted even sweeter with a spoonful of honey.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as the sweeter side of a lollipop.
meanings.sent5: The air was filled with the sweeter scent of blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: More pleasant or agreeable than before
meanings.sent1: The new puppy was sweeter than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The weather today is much sweeter than yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The surprise gift made the day even sweeter.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was sweeter than a melody from a music box.
meanings.sent5: The victory tasted sweeter after all the hard work.

meanings.definition: Someone who is kind or affectionate
meanings.sent1: She is known as the sweeter in our group for her caring nature.
meanings.sent2: The sweeter always has a kind word for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The little girl hugged her teddy bear, calling it her sweeter.
meanings.sent4: He was a sweeter, always ready to lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent5: The sweeter of the family, she always put others' needs before her own.
